title: A Measure of security
creator_credit: United States Information Agency and Robert Guenette
brief_description: Documents the range and effectiveness of the U.S. Social Security system. It is the story of four people deriving supplemental incomes through old-age, disability, medicare and survivor benefits under the Social Security programme. All lead full and productive lives that might otherwise have been blighted by fear and poverty.
